name: ᴜɴɪᴏɴ
description:
It's not art - it's a tool for producing art

Every owner of this NFT is an official Shvembldr collaborator. With this tool, you can produce an infinite amount of art, part of which will be the creative idea and algorithm of Shvembldr and the other part - your imagination and ability to operate it.

Each owner of this NFT has the right to use the resulting art in any form: remake it, use post-processing, collages, use as a background or skin etc. And also to put it for sale as an NFT with these conditions: 25% of the sale must be transferred to Shvembldr as the author of the algorithm and he must be mentioned in the title or description of the art as a collaborator, and the description must contain a link to this tool.

Everyone else is covered by the license CC BY-NC 4.0.

INSTRUCTIONS:

For maximum convenience, use the direct link “view on ipfs”

The workspace size is the size of your window in the browser

Buttons 1 to 9 toggle Pixel Density (Set it to the maximum your computer can do to get a good quality, large image) (it will reset nodes)


The entire keyboard is used to control it. Parameters are visible in the console (cmd+shift+i) controls are used

CONTROLS: 

Mouse pressed: multiply speed parameters

Arrow Right: reset parameters
Arrow Down: save PNG (only on ifps, if you are on the Hic et Nunc website use right-click to save)
Arrow Up = CHAOS mode

‘-‘ = decrease speed multiplier
‘=‘ = increase speed multiplier
‘q’ = toggle stroke transparency
‘w’ = toggle fill transparency
‘e’ = toggle explosion
‘r' = modify alpha ratio
’t’ = toggle lines visibility
‘y’ = increase color speed
‘u’ = toggle nodes fill
‘i’ = increase size speed
‘o’ = toggle opacity smooth
‘p’ = increase alpha speed
‘a’ = rectangles mode
’s’ = triangles mode
‘d’ = circles mode
‘f’ = increase radius
‘g’ = increase stroke weight     
‘h’ = increase nodes desired separation
‘j’ = increase nodes separation cohesion ratio 
‘k’ = increase nodes maximum force
‘l’ = increase nodes maximum speed
‘z’ = toggle nodes rotation
‘x’ = increase rotation speed
‘c’ = toggle nodes visibility
‘v’ = swap color palette
‘b’ = switch explode type
’n’ = toggle stroke effect
‘m’ = toggle stroke dash
‘,' = switch background type (will reset nodes)
‘.’ = random nodes count
‘;’ = toggle bezier mode  
‘[‘ = toggle bezier fill
‘/‘ = shuffle all parameters

Created by Shvembldr
